definition: to give access or entrance to
details:
verb
- to give access or entrance to
= example: to give access or entrance to
- to afford possibility
= example: to afford possibility
= synonyms: allow
- to declare to be true or admit the existence or reality or truth of
= example: to declare to be true or admit the existence or reality or truth of
= synonyms: acknowledge
- to allow to enter
= example: to allow to enter
= synonyms: let in, allow in, intromit
- to serve as a means of entrance
= example: to serve as a means of entrance
- to have room for
= example: to have room for
= synonyms: hold
